entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
